answers.answer: Hi there.I'm sorry that you are going through all of these in such a young age.  The improvement of your symptoms with the vitamins gives us vital clue on what might really be the problem.  You maybe lacking the other B vitamins as well as some minerals such as Calcium and Potassium.  Stress can be also an important factor since stress heightens your perception of pain.I also suggest that you talk to your doctor regarding a multidisciplinary conference (with other doctors; they usually have these conferences in hospitals) that handle complicated perplexing cases.  For now I suggest you avoid stress as much as possible, make sure you have a balanced diet (with fruits and vegetables) and stay away from preserved foods.Hoping for your recovery... regards...

Hello Lolly79! I feel for you! I feel bad that you are so young and having to deal with all this. I am 43 and am just now going through all this. Alot of your symptoms are the same as mine. Honesty alot of it sounds like anxiety, but I know it is all very REAL. Believe me! I layed awake all last night worrying about my muscle twitches. I have had them for about a year. I had low Calcium and Vitamin D and the calcium is normal again but I don't know about the Vitamin D yet. When your chemistry levels are off it can reak havoc so get those levels all checked out. Most of all try not to panic. It makes it worse. I am right there with ya. Take care! Get better sweetie!

question: Im an 18 year old female and for the past few years since i was 13/14 i have been experiencing so many worrying symptoms.-shooting nerve pains in legs which make legs go weak.-headaches-blurred vision-stabbing pains in arms, legs, neck, hands and feet-tingling in hands and feet-pain behind eyes-muscle twitches and fasciculations-abdominal problems which are like IBS- painful jaw joint which sometimes clicks and is painfuland many more!!Im so scared that i have some neurological/neuromuscular or autoimmune disorder! I have had numerous blood tests done, negative for rheumatoid arthritis and diabetes. The only thing which came back abnormal was a low b12 of 203. Ive had 6 b12 injections and i felt a bit better for about a week but now the symptoms are back worse than ever. Please help me im so scared that there is something seriously/fatally wrong with me.
title: please help me!!
